00053 class APTLIB_API Verbose {
00054

00059   class Param {
00060 
00061   public: 
00062     Param(ProgressHandler *progHandler, MsgHandler *msgHandler, MsgHandler *warnHandler) {
00063       m_Verbosity = 1;
00064       m_NewLine = true;
00065       m_Output = true;
00066       m_ProHandler.push_back(progHandler);
00067       m_MsgHandler.push_back(msgHandler);
00068       m_WarnHandler.push_back(warnHandler);
00069     }
00070 
00071     std::vector<ProgressHandler *> m_ProHandler; 
00072     std::vector<MsgHandler *> m_MsgHandler; 
00073     std::vector<MsgHandler *> m_WarnHandler; 
00074     bool m_NewLine;   
00075     bool m_Output;    
00076     int m_Verbosity;  
00077     std::vector<int> m_DotMod;     
00078     std::vector<int> m_DotCount;   
00079   };
